original_text: And it came to pass at the seventh time, when the priests blew with the trumpets, Joshua said unto the people, Shout; for the Lord hath given you the city.
korean_text: 일곱 번째에 제사장들이 나팔을 불 때에 여호수아가 백성에게 이르되 외치라 여호와께서 너희에게 이 성을 주셨느니라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass at the seventh time
when the priests blew with the trumpets
for the Lord hath given you the city
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 여호와께서 이 성을 너희에게 주셨음이라
